Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Alex Smythers
Reviews.Content: My previous camera was an Olympus I had for more than 5 years. I simply cannot believe the technological advances since that time. I read a lot of reviews before selecting this camera for general use on vacations and portraits, but the clincher is the speed, focus and sensitivity for bird pictures.The camera is so versatile that you will need to use all the resources to take advantage of it. Go to youtube and look at the Graham Houghton videos before you decide. Then take careful notes to carry with you in the field. Also visit his web site and download his flashcard tips.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Frank Collura
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping. Great price. The camera takes really high quality photos all the features are really nice.  Very pleased with my purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
48x Intelligent zoom, less ghost with Nano Surface Coating Lens, Power O.I.S.
60p Full HD Video Recording with OIS Active mode
Full range F2.8, 24x Optical Zoom Leica DC Lens
12MP new high sensitivity MOS sensor
High resolution EVF (1.3M dot), High speed AF 0.1 sec, High speed burst shooting 12fps
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ200 12.1 MP Digital Camera with CMOS Sensor and 24x Optical Zoom - Black
